author: R. Prasad
title: Shutdown alone is not enough to break the chain, says Giridhara Babu
description: Mitigation and containment need to go hand-in-hand, says Professor Giridhara Babu, head of Lifecourse Epidemiology at the Public Health Foundation of India
content: In an unprecedented measure, India on March 25 began a country-wide shutdown for 21 days to cut the transmission chain of the novel coronavirus SARS-CoV-2. Till Wednesday, India had adopted the containment measures of screening, testing, isolating and tracing… [+9264 chars]
